sentences.english: The methamphetamine "pervitin" is one of the most widespread drugs in the area because of ease of availability.

sentences.english: What is the function of ligase in DNA replication?

sentences.english: In the case of rimming steel, no or some deoxidation is carried out before casting.
sentences.chinese: 沸騰鋼在鑄錠前不脫氧或輕度脫氧。

sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.
sentences.chinese: 動物的脫氧核糖核酸可能遭到了各種各樣的突變破壞。

sentences.english: DNA told the body how to build proteins.
sentences.chinese: 脫氧核糖核酸告訴身體如何建立蛋白質。

sentences.english: Smelting is made under the oxidizing atmosphere, and deoxidization is made utilizing deoxidizer before pouring.
sentences.chinese: 澆注前，爐內用脫氧劑進行脫氧。

sentences.english: Smelting is made under the oxidizing atmosphere, and deoxidization is made utilizing deoxidizer before pouring.

sentences.english: Adopting orthogonal experiment, the iron series deoxidizer was tested.
sentences.chinese: 對鐵系脫氧劑的組成進行試驗。

sentences.english: In the past the crystallizer was made of a deoxidized copper with a good thermal conductivity.

sentences.english: The inhibition of deoxynucleoside metabolism is one possibility.

sentences.english: After resistant exercise, the calcium secretion in urine is increased and urine deoxy- pyridinoline is decreased.
sentences.chinese: 抗阻練習後，尿鈣分泌增加，尿脫氧吡啶酚也下降。

sentences.english: DNA is the short form of deoxyribonucleic acid .
sentences.chinese: DNA是脫氧核糖核酸的縮寫形式。

sentences.english: Enzyme that polymerizes deoxyribonucleotides to make DNA.

sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.
sentences.chinese: 脫氧核糖核酸可能遭到了各種各樣的突變破壞。

sentences.english: The mutant DNＡ miscoded a single amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 突變體脫氧核糖核酸誤編了一個氨基酸密碼。
